programme.title: President Jiang in America
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton's ground breaking meeting with President Jiang of China.
programme.medium_synopsis: Chinese President Jiang's 1997 visit to America to meet President Clinton, the dangers of a strong Chinese economy, and Saddam Hussein's threat to shoot down planes over Iraq.
